info.name: DigitalWallonia.be API V3 Documentation
info.description:
# Overview List of queries allowing the partners to access Digital Wallonia API V3 read-only
Only partner's owned datas are availble. # Environment Variables in requests'urls and bodies are between double braces. Ex: {{my_token}}. You have to replace the entire string (double braces included) with your custom variables or set them in the environment if you use Postman Desktop Application # Authentication Access is strictly authorized by the use of a token. You can get a token by making a post request on the /users/login endpoint with your username and password in the body's request.
The time to live is 2 weeks. # Error Codes Code | Error --- | --- 401 | Authorization Required 404 | There is no method to handle the request # Team For any question contact us at [webdev@adn.be](mailto:webdev@adn.be)
